sentences.sContent: Morpheme is the basic unit in the study of morphology.
sentences.sContent_eng: Morpheme is the basic unit in the study of morphology.
sentences.sCn: 词素是形态学研究的最基本的单位。

sentences.sContent: No longer can biologists be content simply to study morphology.
sentences.sContent_eng: No longer can biologists be content simply to study morphology.
sentences.sCn: 生物学家不再满足于简单地研究形态学。

sentences.sContent: The rings and networks have some classificatory characteristics in morphology.
sentences.sContent_eng: The rings and networks have some classificatory characteristics in morphology.
sentences.sCn: 菌环、菌网及孢子具有一定的形态学特征。

synos.tran: [晶体][生物]形态学，形态论；[语]词法，词态学

phrases.pCn: [晶]晶体形态学；形态结晶学；晶体结构

remMethod.val: morph(形状) + ology(…学) → 形态学， 形态论

words.tran: 在屏幕上变换图像；改变

trans.tranOther: the study of the  morpheme s  of a language and of the way in which they are joined together to make words
